summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | Benchmarking machine learning models for the analysis of genetic data using FRESA.CAD Binary Classification Benchmarking | Feature Selection Algorithms for Computer Aided Diagnosis | Contains a set of utilities for building and testing statistical models (linear, logistic,ordinal or COX) for Computer Aided Diagnosis/Prognosis applications. Utilities include data adjustment, univariate analysis, model building, model-validation, longitudinal analysis, reporting and visualization
summary.name: FRESA
